text: Cross Street Medical Clinic is fantastic! üëçüèªüëçüèªüëçüèª The receptionists are incredibly friendly and welcoming, ensuring every visit is a positive experience. Dr. Tang's professionalism and extensive knowledge make him an invaluable asset to the clinic. I highly recommend Cross Street Medical Clinic for anyone seeking exceptional medical care. Additionally, they are very technology-savvy, offering online appointment booking to make your waiting time smoother.

Dr Reginald is great! Very friendly and kind, he was efficient to get the required medicine for my bronchitis and then happy to patiently explain how to use it. If you're travelling in Singapore and want fast and easy medical assistance this is the place to go. The receptionist is very nice and helpful too!

Super helpful DR & receptionist

My daughter gets better now

I want to express my deepest gratitude for the care and attention Dr Reginald Tang provided during my recent visit. His expertise and professionalism have truly made a difference in my health journey.
I appreciate his thoroughness and dedication to his patients.
I am truly grateful for his exceptional care.
Thank you once again for your outstanding support and commitment to my well-being. Your compassionate approach and medical expertise are truly commendable.

- Ronald

The old receptionist, short hair, in glasses, working on 8Jun morning,  has a bad attitude. Firstly, she asked me to wait as she's in the midst of doing something. Fine. No empathy for patients and warned(not informing with courtesy)that patients with an appointment will get priority to see the doctor. This is as with other clinics, so what's the big deal. She was not even concerned about registering you, she requires an acceptance of her statement. I said I would leave given her bad attitude, she say go! Dr Tang, please change her out as her rudeness will only cause angst to an already sick patient. I mentioned that I will provide you the feedback and she said go ahead. It is appalling that you are not doing anything about it given all the negative reviews about your receptionist. No wonder this old hag has the least respect for you. I hope she doesn't fall sick and get the same kind of treatment elsewhere.

Too bad for Dr Tang : If you do not want to deal with a rude receptionist before you see a doctor, go to Chinatown Wellness Clinic just upstairs Cross Clinic : Blk 531 Upper Cross Street #02-01. The receptionists are friendly and professional. Obviously, they know how to better manage the queue. Dr Lai is also very thorough and patient.
